target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003310_THANCRED<tab>As if people transforming into those monstrosities wasn't bad enough, if the flora and fauna─if the land itself turned against us...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003320_ESTINIEN<tab>...No one would survive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003320_ESTINIEN<tab>...No one would survive.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003330_MIHLEEL<tab>Here's your order, friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003330_MIHLEEL<tab>Here's your order, friend.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003340_MIHLEEL<tab>May you find comfort in these dark times.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003340_MIHLEEL<tab>May you find comfort in these dark times.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003350_ALISAIE<tab>Where do we go from here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003350_ALISAIE<tab>Where do we go from here?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003360_ALISAIE<tab>If there's one thing we've learned, fighting blindly and simply reacting to what comes will accomplish nothing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003360_ALISAIE<tab>If there's one thing we've learned, fighting blindly and simply reacting to what comes will accomplish nothing.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003370_ALISAIE<tab>We must find a solution that addresses the fundamental cause. Before our strength is exhausted. Before this crisis spirals out of control!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003370_ALISAIE<tab>We must find a solution that addresses the fundamental cause. Before our strength is exhausted. Before this crisis spirals out of control!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003380_ALISAIE<tab>Is there something...anything we've overlooked?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003380_ALISAIE<tab>Is there something...anything we've overlooked?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003390_YSHTOLA<tab>If there is an answer, Hydaelyn Herself will have it. 'Twas She who bound Zodiark and forestalled the Final Days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003390_YSHTOLA<tab>If there is an answer, Hydaelyn Herself will have it. 'Twas She who bound Zodiark and forestalled the Final Days.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>Alas, we have heard naught from Her since the Tower of Babil. Whether She cannot or will not speak, I can only speculate...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>Alas, we have heard naught from Her since the Tower of Babil. Whether She cannot or will not speak, I can only speculate...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>Even the flower She gave us is no more...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>Even the flower She gave us is no more...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003420_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>In our time, we called it “Elpis”... You would do well to remember the name.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003420_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>In our time, we called it “Elpis”... You would do well to remember the name.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>So advised the watcher...but what could be the significance of that name? It is entirely unfamiliar to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>So advised the watcher...but what could be the significance of that name? It is entirely unfamiliar to me.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003440_ALPHINAUD<tab>To me as well. It meant something to the ancients, though. “In <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> time...”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003440_ALPHINAUD<tab>To me as well. It meant something to the ancients, though. “In <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> time...”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>Most surely. Yet I do not recall a single mention of it in the records of Anyder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>Most surely. Yet I do not recall a single mention of it in the records of Anyder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003460_ALISAIE<tab>Another dead end, and quite literally. It's not as if there are any ancients living we could go and ask...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003460_ALISAIE<tab>Another dead end, and quite literally. It's not as if there are any ancients living we could go and ask...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003470_GRAHATIA<tab>Not alive as such...but not quite dead...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003470_GRAHATIA<tab>Not alive as such...but not quite dead...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003480_GRAHATIA<tab>...Elidibus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003480_GRAHATIA<tab>...Elidibus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003490_GRAHATIA<tab>I sealed him in the white auracite of the Crystal Tower, back on the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003490_GRAHATIA<tab>I sealed him in the white auracite of the Crystal Tower, back on the First.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003500_GRAHATIA<tab>Contained within that reservoir of aether that maintains it─aether that is returned little by little to the sea...naught may remain of his soul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003500_GRAHATIA<tab>Contained within that reservoir of aether that maintains it─aether that is returned little by little to the sea...naught may remain of his soul.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003510_GRAHATIA<tab>However, if part of it lingers...we might be able to speak with him there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003510_GRAHATIA<tab>However, if part of it lingers...we might be able to speak with him there.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003520_GRAHATIA<tab>I─no, we can no longer make that journey. But you, my friend, still can.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003520_GRAHATIA<tab>I─no, we can no longer make that journey. But you, my friend, still can.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's worth a try.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's worth a try.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It would be an opportunity to look in on the others as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It would be an opportunity to look in on the others as well.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>If there is truly no other way...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>If there is truly no other way...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003530_GRAHATIA<tab>Yes, we can but act and hope for the best!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003530_GRAHATIA<tab>Yes, we can but act and hope for the best!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003540_GRAHATIA<tab>Thank you, my friend. That would mean much to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003540_GRAHATIA<tab>Thank you, my friend. That would mean much to me.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003550_GRAHATIA<tab>I understand your trepidation, but there is merit in making the journey regardless. You could see with your own eyes whether the First, too, faces its Final Days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003550_GRAHATIA<tab>I understand your trepidation, but there is merit in making the journey regardless. You could see with your own eyes whether the First, too, faces its Final Days.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003560_THANCRED<tab>If nothing else, should we learn the First is safe, we'll have that much more reason to keep fighting the good fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003560_THANCRED<tab>If nothing else, should we learn the First is safe, we'll have that much more reason to keep fighting the good fight.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003570_THANCRED<tab>That said...the odds are not in our favor, to say the least.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003570_THANCRED<tab>That said...the odds are not in our favor, to say the least.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003580_THANCRED<tab>Which is why we're fortunate to have Urianger up there on the moon, working hard to make all the necessary preparations for our departure, should it come to it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003580_THANCRED<tab>Which is why we're fortunate to have Urianger up there on the moon, working hard to make all the necessary preparations for our departure, should it come to it.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003590_ALISAIE<tab>...And why we have nothing to lose by staying the course till the last instant!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003590_ALISAIE<tab>...And why we have nothing to lose by staying the course till the last instant!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003600_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. To the last, let us all do what we can.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003600_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. To the last, let us all do what we can.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003610_YSHTOLA<tab>I will consult with Master Matoya and see if she knows of a way to reach Hydaelyn from the aetherial sea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003610_YSHTOLA<tab>I will consult with Master Matoya and see if she knows of a way to reach Hydaelyn from the aetherial sea.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003620_ALPHINAUD<tab>And I will visit the nations' leaders and attempt to ascertain how far the Final Days have progressed elsewhere.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003620_ALPHINAUD<tab>And I will visit the nations' leaders and attempt to ascertain how far the Final Days have progressed elsewhere.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003630_ESTINIEN<tab>Keep me abreast of your findings. I can seek out and slay the worst of the immediate threats, if only to slow the spread.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003630_ESTINIEN<tab>Keep me abreast of your findings. I can seek out and slay the worst of the immediate threats, if only to slow the spread.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Unease, terror, despair... Try as we might to suppress them, these emotions will return to harry us time and time again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Unease, terror, despair... Try as we might to suppress them, these emotions will return to harry us time and time again.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003650_ALPHINAUD<tab>But when they do, remember this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003650_ALPHINAUD<tab>But when they do, remember this...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Your friends and loved ones are out there, somewhere, sharing in your struggle. You are not alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Your friends and loved ones are out there, somewhere, sharing in your struggle. You are not alone.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003670_EMETSELCH<tab>So ends the brief respite before the next revelation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003670_EMETSELCH<tab>So ends the brief respite before the next revelation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003680_EMETSELCH<tab>Yes, so much left for you to see...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003680_EMETSELCH<tab>Yes, so much left for you to see...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003690_EMETSELCH<tab>Where beginning ends, and end begins...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003690_EMETSELCH<tab>Where beginning ends, and end begins...
